# Test Data

These XML samples are copied from the CEN NeTEx GitHub repository
`NeTEx-CEN/NeTEx` at commit `4f42794047ec9944fd38e4497f3af142a33462c8`.

## NeTEx
- `testdata/netex/Netex_01.1_Bus_SimpleTimetable_JourneysOnly.xml`
  - Source: `examples/functions/timetable/Netex_01.1_Bus_SimpleTimetable_JourneysOnly.xml`
- `testdata/netex/Netex_09.2_Bus_SimpleTimetable_Slovenia.xml`
  - Source: `examples/functions/timetable/Netex_09.2_Bus_SimpleTimetable_Slovenia.xml`
- `testdata/netex/Netex_01.2_Bus_SimpleTimetable_WithTimings.xml`
  - Source: `examples/functions/timetable/Netex_01.2_Bus_SimpleTimetable_WithTimings.xml`

## SIRI
- `testdata/siri/exa_dataReady_request.xml`
  - Source: `examples/ws_siri_request/siri_generic/exa_dataReady_request.xml`
- `testdata/siri/exu_dataObject_request.xml`
  - Source: `examples/ws_siri_request/siri_netex/exu_dataObject_request.xml`

Additional SIRI-ET examples (official SIRI schema examples, not part of the CEN NeTEx repo):
- `testdata/siri/ext_estimatedTimetable_request.xml`
  - Source: `https://siri.org.uk/schema/1.3/examples/ext_estimatedTimetable_request.xml`
- `testdata/siri/ext_estimatedTimetable_response.xml`
  - Source: `https://siri.org.uk/schema/1.3/examples/ext_estimatedTimetable_response.xml`

Additional SIRI examples (official SIRI 1.4 schema examples):
- `testdata/siri/exv_vehicleMonitoring_request.xml`
  - Source: `https://www.siri.org.uk/schema/1.4/examples/exv_vehicleMonitoring_request.xml`
- `testdata/siri/exv_vehicleMonitoring_response.xml`
  - Source: `https://www.siri.org.uk/schema/1.4/examples/exv_vehicleMonitoring_response.xml`
- `testdata/siri/exs_stopMonitoring_request.xml`
  - Source: `https://www.siri.org.uk/schema/1.4/examples/exs_stopMonitoring_request.xml`
- `testdata/siri/exs_stopMonitoring_response.xml`
  - Source: `https://www.siri.org.uk/schema/1.4/examples/exs_stopMonitoring_response.xml`
- `testdata/siri/exx_situationExchange_request.xml`
  - Source: `https://www.siri.org.uk/schema/1.4/examples/exx_situationExchange_request.xml`
- `testdata/siri/exx_situationExchange_response.xml`
  - Source: `https://www.siri.org.uk/schema/1.4/examples/exx_situationExchange_response.xml`
